item.title: Tell Me Your Environment and I Tell You What Your Context Is
item.description: Introduction At my previous work we had this problem where we couldn’t run through our entire workflow in our integration system because we were missing the necessary input data to some central service’s integration instance. We therefore took it upon us to provide said data by asynchronously mirroring data from prod to int. This is definitely not a “Five tips on how to deal with numbers in JavaScript – NaN will shock you!
